module.name: Call Flow Control
module.description: Call Flow manual toggle control - allows for two destinations to be chosen and provides a feature code that toggles between the two destinations.
module.changelog: *13.0.9* FREEPBX-11228 Update destination link *13.0.8* FREEPBX-11169 FREEPBX-11165 *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10732 Fix destination link *13.0.6* Slideout menu *13.0.5* Better CoS checks *13.0.4* Fix and tweak to work *13.0.3* Fix popover resolves FREEPBX-8993 for daynght *13.0.2* FREEPBX-8689 - All Call Flow Toggle not working *13.0.1* FREEPBX-8689 *13.0.1alpha2* FREEPBX-8299 Increase number of available call flow control flows *13.0.1alpha1* Skinning updates *2.11.0.4* Part fix for #6923 language not being set. *2.11.0.3* Add license file *2.11.0.2* Add a * to toggle all extension feature codes *2.11.0.1* Add feature code to toggle all *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.3* #4993 *2.9.0.2* #4740, #4758, #4768 *2.9.0.1* #4651, #4653, #4655 *2.9.0.0* #4636 *2.8.0.0* #4309 *2.7.0.0* spelling errors, localizations *2.6.0.2* #3585 custom recordings *2.6.0.1* init tabindex *2.6.0.0* #3650, #3651
